gurmukhi: pwn kpUr lauNg cr kwgY AwgY rwKY ibstw ibgMD Kwq AiDk isXwn kY
transliteration: Paan Kapoor Laoung Char Kaagai Aagai Raakhai , Bisataa Bigandh Khaat Adhik Siyaan Kai ?
translation: If aromatic substances like betel leaf, camphor, clove etc. are placed before a crow, even then by his notion of being wise, he will eat filth and bad smelling things.

gurmukhi: bwr bwr s√çwn jau pY gMgw iesnwnu krY trY n kutyv dyv hoq n AigAwn kY
transliteration: Baar Baar Svaan Jau Pai Gangaa Isanaanu Karai , Tarai N Koutayv Dayv Hot N Agiaan Kai ?
translation: If a dog bathes in river Ganges many a time, even then he can't get over his bad habit of eating the left overs. Because of this foolishness, he cannot be of divine disposition.

gurmukhi: swpih pY pwn imstwn mhwN AMmiRq kY auglq kwlkUt haumY AiBmwn kY
transliteration: Saapahi Pai Paan Misataan Mahaan Anmrit Kai , Ougalat Kaalakoot Haoumai Abhimaan Kai ?
translation: If a snake is served very sweetened milk, even then intoxicated with pride, he will spill out venom.

gurmukhi: qYsy mwnsr swDsMgiq mrwl sBw Awn dyv syvk qkq bgu iDAwn kY ]491]
transliteration: Taisay Maanasar Saadhasangati Maraal Sabhaa , Aan Dayv Sayvak Takat Bagu Dhiaan Kai ?491?
translation: Similarly, the Mansarover lake like congregation is an assembly of Sikhs of the Guru who pick pearls from there. But if this assembly is also visited by a follower of gods and goddesses, he would be looking around at others, their wealth with evil eyes an
